programInfo.location: Workshops at Tellus or Business Corner, Oulu University, with outdoor venues for events
programInfo.model: In-person model to maximize flexibility and engagement. Participants will be able to join workshops, attend in-person networking events, and engage with mentors during office hours.

workshops.title: Kickoff Event
workshops.description: Program introduction and team building activities

workshops.title: Workshop 1: Foundations of Startup Success
workshops.description: Establishing the business model and validating ideas. Covers Business Model Canvas, Market Validation, and Branding. Deliverables: Validated Lean Canvas and a 60-second elevator pitch.

workshops.title: Workshop 2: Prototyping & Business Development
workshops.description: Turning ideas into prototypes and refining business models. Learn how to build MVPs and refine your Business Model Canvas. Deliverables: A working MVP prototype and a refined Business Model Canvas.

workshops.title: Workshop 3: Scaling & Market Strategy
workshops.description: Growing the business and acquiring customers. Learn cost-effective strategies for scaling rapidly, building effective digital marketing strategies, and designing a customer acquisition funnel. Deliverables: A comprehensive marketing and sales strategy and a refined investor-ready pitch deck.

workshops.title: Workshop 4: Pitch Preparation & Refinement
workshops.description: Perfecting the pitch and preparing for the final presentation. Learn how to craft a compelling 5-minute pitch and receive feedback from mentors. Deliverables: A polished pitch deck and a 5-minute pitch script.
topics: Booth Setup for Outdoor Startup Fair

workshops.title: Pitch Day
workshops.description: Live pitching to a panel of investors, mentors, and industry leaders, followed by dinner. Award Ceremony for categories such as Best Pitch, Most Scalable Idea, and Audience Favorite.

workshops.title: Outdoor Startup Fair
workshops.description: Startups present their MVPs in booths (physical and virtual). Networking with investors and peers. Keynote session in the evening, followed by after party.

workshops.title: Nordic Retreat & Closing Ceremony
workshops.description: Relaxing activities like sauna experiences and kayaking under the Midnight Sun. Official closing of the program with certificates and final networking.
